title: Happy Birthday, Kanata!
detail_text: <:th_ch0009/>Happy birthday! You’re the star of today, Kanata! You may ask this Nico wha~tever you want!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Thank you, Nico-chan~. Then, Kanata would like a lap....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Hey!!! Why would you take a nap even though Nico is celebrating with you! Accept my grand celebrations Nico!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Ooh, as expected of Nico-chan, Kanata can feel the power~. Then, Kanata wants to eat food made by you, Nico-chan<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Alright! Nico will make you an amazing feast!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Ah, that’s not what Kanata meant~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Hah? What do you mean, then?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Kanata wants to eat the food you usually make, Nico-chan. Something like an omelet and beef and potato stew.... Ah, and miso soup too~. Kanata wants to eat something with a different flavor than what Kanata makes myself<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Eeeh, are you fine with that? Pick something more celebratory....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>It’s fine, it’s fine~. After all, your food is the best present for me, Nico-chan~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
